body:
This PR adds the [QtWayland](https://doc.qt.io/qt-5/wayland-and-qt.html) module into the `qt` package in depends.

This change allows to build release binaries for Linux systems that can run nativelyâas a Wayland clientâon modern desktops with Wayland compositors.

Closes #19950.
